event.p: New committer: Jayachandran C. (src)
Enhanced commit privileges: Martin Matuška (src, ports)

event.title: January-March, 2010 Status Report
event.p: The January-March, 2010 Status Report is now available with 46 entries.
New committer: Randi Harper (src)
New committer: Ryan Stone (src)
New committer: Ana Kukec (src)
Enhanced commit privileges: René Ladan (doc-nl, ports)
New committer: Sahil Tandon (ports)
New committer: Giuseppe Pilichi (ports)

event.title: The &os; Project Participates in the Google Summer of Code 2010 Program
event.p: &os; Project is participating in Google's Summer of Code programme for a sixth year. Undergraduate and graduate students are invited to apply for a grant to spend the summer improving the &os; operating system! More information available on the &os; Summer of code page, including a poster to hang up at a university near you!
New committer: Bernhard Fröhlich (ports)

event.title: FreeBSD 7.3-RELEASE Available
event.p: FreeBSD 7.3-RELEASE is now available. Please be sure to check the Release Notes and Release Errata before installation for any late-breaking news and/or issues with 7.3. More information about FreeBSD releases can be found on the Release Information page.

event.title: New Ports Management Team Secretary: Thomas Abthorpe
event.p: The &os; Ports Management Team is pleased to announce Thomas Abthorpe has assumed the role of Ports Management Team Secretary.
Returning committer: Niels Heinen (ports)

event.title: &os; 7.3-RC2 Available
event.p: The second Release Candidate build for the &os;-7.3 release cycle is now available. ISO images for Tier-1 architectures are now available on most of the &os; mirror sites.
New committer: Neel Natu (src)

event.title: PC-BSD 8.0 Released
event.p: PC-BSD 8.0 has been released. PC-BSD is a successful desktop operating system based on FreeBSD that focuses on providing an easy to use desktop system for casual computer users. A list of new features/updates since the last version can be found here.
The new release can be downloaded or purchased on DVD.

event.title: &os; 7.3-RC1 Available
event.p: The first Release Candidate build for the &os;-7.3 release cycle is now available. ISO images for Tier-1 architectures are now available on most of the &os; mirror sites.
Enhanced commit privileges: Benedict Reuschling (full doc/www)
New committer: Bernhard Schmidt (src)

event.title: Enhanced commit privileges: Gábor Kövesdán (src, ports, doc)
event.p: Gábor Kövesdán participated in Google Summer of Code 2008/2009 and for his work he has been given commit access to the source code. His first pieces of work will be bringing in the result of his summer work into the tree.

event.title: &os; 7.3-BETA1 Available
event.p: The first BETA build for the &os;-7.3 release cycle is now available. ISO images for Tier-1 architectures are now available on most of the &os; mirror sites.
New committer: Bruce Cran (src)
New committer: Ulrich Spörlein (src)
New committer: Romain Tartière (ports)
New committer: Alberto Villa (ports)

event.title: October-December, 2009 Status Report
event.p: The October-December, 2009 Status Report is now available with 38 entries.
